SELECT (row_number() over()) cnt, a.kwd_a, a.kwd_b, a.doc_date, a.doc_cnt_both, CASE LEFT(a.category_code, 5) WHEN '08201' THEN '1' WHEN '08202' THEN '2' END cId FROM (SELECT ka.kwd_a, ka.kwd_b, ka.doc_date, ka.doc_cnt_both, ka.category_code FROM dm.weekly_kwd_trend_cnt_v2 ka
AND ka.fid = #{param.fid}

ORDER BY ka.doc_date, ka.doc_cnt_both DESC ) a
